 2016-03402016-05-13,  ECCC,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Repealing the Vinyl Chloride Release Regulations, 1992
PrecisRegulations Repealing the VINYL CHLORIDE RELEASE REGULATIONS, 1992 in order to eliminate federal-provincial regulatory duplication and reduce the administrative burden in the polyvinyl chloride manufacturing sector, without compromising human health.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0096 Publication Date: 2016-06-01
